channel.title: Project Roonscape (serious coders ONLY) (now in the RIGHT section lol)
channel.description:
Hey there moparscape fans Welcome all boys and girls!
This is the Official Project Roonscape thread!
Our goal: To re-create Runescape as closely as possible with a private server.
Reason: Would you not like to have Runescape back before the pking update and trade fixes?
Coders: Hah Bah Gee Ethan Yama More to come!
Please post if you want to be a coder and have PREVIOUS EXPERIENCE!
All coders will get property rights!
Things that need to be done till finish:
Lumbridge: RFD chest in cellar Castletop Bank All npc's to correct locations Alter in church working Guides working Set Bob's Axe shop
Tutorial Island: Get ALL skills working Set spawn point Get ::char working Get teleport to Lumbridge working at end
Varrok: Set all Npc's Create proper shops Create tele to ess mining area Create mineable essence
Falador: Set Npc's Create shops Create tele to Dwarven mines
Draynor: Set proper Trees Set teleport to Ess mines at tower Set Npc's Do something fun with wise old man
Ardrougne: Fix west/east requirements Set Npc's Fix shops Fix thieving stalls Fix teleport lever to wilderness Fix agility log Fix teleport to underground pass
Camelot: Set Npc's Set shops Set proper trees
Fremmenik: Get rock crabs to the north Get teleports to neitiznot, jatizso, and lunar isle Set Npc's Set shops
Yanille: Fix Mage guild Add ess tele in mage guild Fix Npc's Fix shops
Other: Fix Agility Fix Teleports to work Fix minigames Fix all other npc's not located in cities Set correct drops Set correct xp given Fix armor requirements Fix weapon requirements Fix max hits with weapons and items Make so D Bow needs arrows Get Rune Crossbow working, and fix bolt effects... Add all graphics! Figure out a way to work the "worlds" options (I.E. being in world 3, pming people in world 2 etc...)
So far thats asll I can think of, we will be working with a random server, it will be decided once we find one we like, and have enough coders. We will all add eachothers msn's and be setting a shared folder among the msn's for file sharing.
Please post if you want to help code the greatest private server being created! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 04:17:38 PM[/size][hr]Please note, this IS going to take a while, but its worth it, sign up now!

I may create forums, I’m a fairly good php coder, so it wouldnt be too much of a hassle, but i want some coders first, and nets, if all you want to do is spam, go back to playing runescape you 13 year old kid… -.-

Haters. You better lay low about 13 years old kids.

item.title: Project Roonscape (serious coders ONLY) (now in the RIGHT section lol)
item.dc:creator: @HahBahGee HahBahGee
item.description:
@HahBahGee wrote:

Hey there moparscape fans Welcome all boys and girls!

This is the Official Project Roonscape thread!

Our goal: To re-create Runescape as closely as possible with a private server.

Reason: Would you not like to have Runescape back before the pking update and trade fixes?

Coders:
Hah Bah Gee
Ethan
Yama
More to come!

Please post if you want to be a coder and have PREVIOUS EXPERIENCE!

All coders will get property rights!

Things that need to be done till finish:

Lumbridge:
RFD chest in cellar
Castletop Bank
All npc’s to correct locations
Alter in church working
Guides working
Set Bob’s Axe shop

Tutorial Island:
Get ALL skills working
Set spawn point
Get ::char working
Get teleport to Lumbridge working at end

Varrok:
Set all Npc’s
Create proper shops
Create tele to ess mining area
Create mineable essence

Falador:
Set Npc’s
Create shops
Create tele to Dwarven mines

Draynor:
Set proper Trees
Set teleport to Ess mines at tower
Set Npc’s
Do something fun with wise old man

Ardrougne:
Fix west/east requirements
Set Npc’s
Fix shops
Fix thieving stalls
Fix teleport lever to wilderness
Fix agility log
Fix teleport to underground pass

Camelot:
Set Npc’s
Set shops
Set proper trees

Fremmenik:
Get rock crabs to the north
Get teleports to neitiznot, jatizso, and lunar isle
Set Npc’s
Set shops

Yanille:
Fix Mage guild
Add ess tele in mage guild
Fix Npc’s
Fix shops

Other:
Fix Agility
Fix Teleports to work
Fix minigames
Fix all other npc’s not located in cities
Set correct drops
Set correct xp given
Fix armor requirements
Fix weapon requirements
Fix max hits with weapons and items
Make so D Bow needs arrows
Get Rune Crossbow working, and fix bolt effects…
Add all graphics!
Figure out a way to work the “worlds” options (I.E. being in world 3, pming people in world 2 etc…)

So far thats asll I can think of, we will be working with a random server, it will be decided once we find one we like, and have enough coders. We will all add eachothers msn’s and be setting a shared folder among the msn’s for file sharing.

Please post if you want to help code the greatest private server being created!
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 04:17:38 PM[/size][hr]Please note, this IS going to take a while, but its worth it, sign up now!
